txt.en: Return to Tegwen Spurrey with the driftwood you have collected
Tegwen Spurrey can be found at Trader's Wharf.\n\nYou should return to Tegwen Spurrey with the driftwood you have collected.
'Ah, this driftwood will do nicely. We should be able to fashion some of this into mining tools. Thank you for assisting the League, [placeholder].'
'My mum will be so happy when I take this home!'

'We could use all the supplies we can get. I'm not about to level the whole forest just to make the mine of Writhenset safe. We need to make a home for us here in the Wildwood.\n\n'With that said, the Brandywine River provides. A large amount of driftwood just washed up on the banks of the river this morning. Collect it for me and the League will be grateful.'
Driftwood has washed up on the shores of the Brandywine River and is a resource worth harvesting for the League of the Axe.
Driftwood can be found on the shores of the Brandywine, near Trader's Wharf.\n\nYou should collect driftwood for the League of the Axe.
